mapper.sql: id, area_id, area_path_and_id, attachment_md5_list, category_key, category_path_and_key, repairer_id, sender_id, squad_id, close_status, close_time, close_user, condition, desc, drawing_md5, destroy_at, destroy_user, plan_end_on, end_on, last_assigner, last_assigner_at, list_id, pos_x, pos_y, project_id, status, typ, uuid, region_uuid, zone_uuid, client_create_at, create_at, update_at, delete_at
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(`client_create_at`) AS new_count, DATE_FORMAT( `client_create_at`, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS days FROM measure_list_issue WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND list_id = #{listId} AND close_status = #{unclosecode} AND delete_at IS NULL AND client_create_at >= concat(#{startTime},'00:00:00') AND client_create_at <= concat(#{endTime},'23:59:59') GROUP BY days

SELECT COUNT(`end_on`) AS reform_count, DATE_FORMAT( `end_on`, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS days FROM measure_list_issue WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND list_id = #{listId} AND close_status = #{unclosecode} AND delete_at IS NULL AND end_on >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{startTime}) AND end_on <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{endTime}) GROUP BY days
